title: Product price scrapper
snippet:
Hi,

We would like a web-based software that will take our products, scrap ebay/amazon/google shopping/competition sites and return prices ad price changes made.  We would need someone who can design a system that will output what we need and be user friendly.  

This will probably be a long term ongoing process with the initial stage being research, then execution, usage, changes, additions.  To discuss further please message me. 

Thanks
Joe
